name: OHHO
description:
Face off in a fencing match between two robots. But be careful: if you hit your opponent more than once before the timer runs out, you lose and the only way to defend yourself is attacking.

The game is played best with a friend (or foe) and can also be played against a CPU with varying diffuculties.

Since the AI is a bit lack-luster, we highly recommend finding another human.

Tell us what you think in the comment section!
